reviewText:
small U.S. company Mill creek have reissued on dvd both Like father Like son & Vice versa
but all Mill creek have done is put 2 films on 1 Disc that's all so just load the Disc & choose which film to watch that's it
tragically no extras no even the original trailer's for each film are added, which Mill creek could've atleast added to the Disc
the 1:85:1 ratio picture quality's for each film are the same Digital remasters as the original dvd versions so nothing's been enhanced at all
Mill creek didn't do much effort they never do in my opinion, pretty pathetic effort
amazon are selling this for $10, it's only worth under $5 considering there's no extras
4 stars for both films, 1-2 stars for this new dvd reissue worth under $5 if your playing close to $10 your getting ripped off
Great product, fast and hassle free.
I bought it for vise versa but ended up with like father like son. Good buy

This was such a great deal and both movies are still as good as they were when I was growing up.  It's funny to see some of the special effects especially since many things have changed since both these movies were made.  If you remember both these movies or not they are great to add to any collection.
Love these movies nice family fun
